nodes.text: Farend Cantina was a cantina located in the Westwater Settlements on the planet Makeb. During the Conquest of Makeb, the spy Tyvar and his family took refuge in the cantina.
The Farend Cantina appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel, a 2013 Digital Expansion for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
